Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_resume_sample

The function AIL_resume_sample resumes playback of a sample which was previously stopped.

void AIL_resume_sample(
  HSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample to resume playing.

Discussion

AIL_resume_sample is usually used to resume playback that has been stopped with a call to AIL_stop_sample, but it can also be used to start a sample without the playback position being reset to the beginning of the sound.


Group: 2D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_end_sample, AIL_resume_sample, AIL_start_sample, AIL_stop_sample
Related Basic Types: HSAMPLE, void
Related FAQs: How do I start an audio file somewhere in the middle?
